text: Sangkira gata takalon ulah Pakriban sungkuep awak meudacha Teukui keupala han jijeut tangah Ubak Po jihnyan jilakee jinoe Wahe Po kamoe kamoe kasalah Meueu meudeungo bandum ka jinoe Neupeuwoe kamoe keudeh ya Allah Mangat meupubuet amai nyang saleh Meuyakin leubeh nibak nyang sudah Watee nyan keubit yakin that kamoe
